sourcesContent:
"use client" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext" const Home = () => { const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth() return (

✨ Task Manager Pro

Organize your life, boost productivity, and achieve your goals with our beautiful task management platform

{isAuthenticated ? ( 🚀 Go to Dashboard ) : ( <> 🎯 Get Started Free 👋 Sign In )}

🌟 Why Choose Task Manager Pro?

📝 Smart Task Creation

Create detailed tasks with descriptions, due dates, and priority levels to stay organized

🎯 Priority Management

Set high, medium, or low priorities to focus on what matters most in your day

📊 Progress Tracking

Mark tasks complete and visualize your productivity with beautiful progress indicators

🔍 Smart Filtering

Filter tasks by status and priority to find exactly what you need, when you need it

) } export default Home
